titles.title: A bill for the relief of Walter J. Shanahan.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation.
Unfavorable Executive Comment Received From Army.

bill.summary: 3/8/1988--Introduced. Makes inapplicable, with respect to the award of the Purple Heart to a named individual, any statute or regulation requiring records of medical treatment for injuries received in action or time limitations within which a military decoration may be recommended or awarded.
